note_tutorial_1: You made it this far. That's fantastic! I can't tell you how badly I need you to keep going.
note_tutorial_2: Full disclosure: these are optional collectibles. Unfortunately they constitute our only avenue of direct communication.
note_tutorial_3:
Yes, you can skip these. Yes, it would break my heart and shatter my dreams.

But the really important things get said at the end.
note_level1_1:
Why does the matchmaking system have a face and personality?

I can't really explain it. Making her made me feel better.
note_level1_2:
Penelope most likely adores you already, but she'll try to hide it. I gave her a healthy dose of self-respect.

Everyone needs that, right? Even chat bots.
